attributes.action: The declassification of Cannabis from the misuse of Drugs Act.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Cannabis is not addictive, nor has enough research been achieved with this drug. Tetra-Hydro-Cannibinol (The substance found in Cannabis) has well destinguished medical porperties for those suffering with, for example Epilepsy.

Cannabis should be declassified as none illegal. How can a goverment which sells us addictive cigarettes, ban us from non-addictive drugs which are medically better for us?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
